name: Growth Spurt
description:
Growth Spurt!

NOTE: It's recommended to go into fullscreen BEFORE you press start!

In growth spurt the aim is to grow your tree. By collecting water pockets you can extend your roots towards the ground water and watch your tree grow beutifully! Be sure to make many different roots to avoid getting stuck at the hidden rocks.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023. It was made in person at the local event,  MalmöJamsToo. Thanks too everyone involved for hosting such a cool event!

Credits:

    • Gustav Almström (Tree, Backgrounds, additional assets)
  • Audio:

    • Torben Nordtorp (Music and Stingers)
  • Game Design:
    • Everyone
